Posts.Content: Apr 28, 2010 04:32PM hel17 wrote: New to this board, but not to Herceptin. I was diagnosed with mets to the lungs in April 2002.  After doing various chemos, I started on Herceptin every 3 weeks in November 2002..... and have been on it continuously for more than 7 years.
